about_the_game:
Artemis VR is your ticket to becoming an astronaut in virtual reality! Step into the shoes of a member of the prestigious Artemis space program and put your skills to the test in the most realistic simulation of modern space travel. Do you have what it takes to lead your mission to success?

Experience thrilling moments, from managing day-to-day operations on board to handling critical situations—extinguishing fires, managing decompression, and even caring for sick crew members. Execute precise spacecraft maneuvers, dock at a space station, and embark on an unforgettable spacewalk (EVA). Artemis VR takes simulation to a whole new level with full immersion and realistic spacesuit experiences.

  • NASA resources and consultation - The game is under development i.e. thanks to NASA resources and consultation in terms of Artemis MIssions

  • Dynamic mission scenarios – each playthrough presents new challenges inspired by real-life emergency procedures in actual space missions.

  • Exploration of unique locations – step inside the Artemis program capsule, visit the International Space Station or traverse the vastness of open space.

  • Full VR immersion – feel like a real astronaut, with realistic physics, thrilling plot twists, and breathtaking space views.

  • Scientific accuracy – every detail is designed to faithfully replicate the reality of modern space missions.

Prepare yourself for a challenge that will test your skills and take you straight to the heart of a space mission. Can you rise to the occasion?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest 2 and Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3050
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest 2 and Valve Index

short_description: As an Artemis astronaut, face the challenges of space flight in the newest manned system that will take humanity back to the Moon thanks to NASA resources and consultation in terms of Artemis MIssions. Manage the mission using VR glasses.
